function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Abnormal concentrations of traffic outside supermarkets and health-care facilities.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to crowded areas.","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures and social distancing protocols to reduce the risk of transmission.","Technologies":"Traffic monitoring systems, CCTV, crowd monitoring software.","People":"Urban residents, supermarket and health-care facility staff, shoppers.","Owner":"Local authorities, health-care facility management, supermarket management."},{"Description":"Capture of changing patterns of traffic, pedestrian, and other activity away from the city centre.","Impact":"Potential spread of disease from increased activity in wider regions.","Mitigation":"Increase surveillance and monitoring in wider regions, promote public awareness of health measures, control and regulate movement in these areas.","Technologies":"Traffic cameras, surveillance drones, public awareness campaigns.","People":"Urban residents, commuters, workers in wider regions.","Owner":"Local municipal authorities, public health agencies, community leaders."},{"Description":"Reduction in air pollution and improvement in environmental indices such as Nitrogen Dioxide.","Impact":"Positive impact on respiratory health, but potential complacency in maintaining environmental improvements.","Mitigation":"Continue to monitor and enforce environmental regulations, promote sustainable and eco-friendly practices even after lockdown.","Technologies":"Environmental sensors, air quality monitoring systems, sustainability campaigns.","People":"City residents, environmental and health organizations, policymakers.","Owner":"Environmental agencies, local government, advocacy groups, businesses."}]}
